explains: n. 矛头；先锋；先锋部队

sentences.cn: 这矛头引出了许多问题。

sentences.en: Whatever his pretensions, Mr Lieberman is not ready to spearhead a revolt.
sentences.cn: 无论他用什么借口，利伯曼先生都不会带头反抗。

sentences.en: News reports said British and French warplanes would spearhead the attack.
sentences.cn: 新闻报道说英国和法国战机有可能成为先遣队发动进攻。
